  • Literature

Text Expression

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Roberta Padlina, project coordinator, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of text expression, based on FRBRoo, in broadest sense, with general subclasses, related classes, and properties.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
skos:note
Text, text structure, prosodic structure, note structure, text editing, and scientific editing are described in respective ontologies
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about text expression
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Classes

text-expression:Article
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text expression about a defined main subject.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-expression:
rdfs:label
article (en)
Artikel (de)
article (fr)
articolo (it)
rdfs:subClassOf
text-expression:IndividualExpression
text-expression:Author
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Role of a person being responsible for the creation of a text expression.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-expression:
rdfs:label
text author (en)
Textautor (de)
auteur du texte (fr)
autore di testo (it)
skos:note
Often an author is also the creator of a text expression.
rdfs:subClassOf
creating:Author
text-expression:Biography
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text expression about a person's life.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-expression:
rdfs:label
biografia (it)
biographie (fr)
biography (en)
Biographie (de)
rdfs:subClassOf
text-expression:IndividualExpression
text-expression:Body
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Main section of a text expression, e.g. including footnotes and illustrations but excluding the front matter and back matter.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-expression:
rdfs:label
corpo del testo (it)
Texthauptteil (de)
text body (en)
corps du texte (fr)
rdfs:seeAlso
https://www.abc-clio.com/ ODLIS/ odlis f.aspx
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:CompositionalContentStructure
text-expression:ExpressionPart

text-expression:Dictionary
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
List of brief explanatory entries for terms of a human natural language, belonging to a certain domain, providing their meaning, mostly ordered, e.g. alphabetically.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-expression:
rdfs:label
dizionario (it)
dictionnaire (fr)
dictionary (en)
Wörterbuch (de)
rdfs:seeAlso
https://www.abc-clio.com/ ODLIS/ odlis f.aspx
rdfs:subClassOf
text-expression:IndividualExpression

text-expression:Introduction
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Beginning section of a text expression, usually written by the (main) author, stating e.g. the subject, purpose and limits of its main section; usually remaining unchanged.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-expression:
rdfs:label
Texteinleitung (de)
text introduction (en)
introduzione al testo (it)
introduction du texte (fr)
rdfs:seeAlso
https://www.abc-clio.com/ ODLIS/ odlis f.aspx
rdfs:subClassOf
text-structure:CompositionalContentStructure
text-expression:ExpressionPart

text-expression:Vulgarizer
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Role of a person vulgarizing a text expression, e.g. a scientific one, or creating one using vulgarizing terminology.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-expression:
rdfs:label

vulgarisat-eur/rice du texte (fr)
volgarizzatore di testo (it)
Text-VulgarisatorIn (de)
rdfs:subClassOf

Properties

text-expression:hasAuthor
a
owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a text expression to a person who authored it.
rdfs:domain
text-expression:Expression
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-expression:
rdfs:label
text expression has author (en)
l'expression de texte a auteur (fr)
Textexpression hat Autor (de)
l'espressione di testo ha autore (it)
skos:note
A text can have more than one author.
rdfs:range
rdfs:subClassOf
human:Person
owl:Restriction
owl:onProperty
human:personHasRole
owl:someValuesFrom
text-expression:Author
rdfs:subPropertyOf
creating:hasAuthor
text-expression:hasCommentator

owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a text expression to a person who commented on it.

text-expression:Expression
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-expression:
rdfs:label

Textexpression hat KommentatorIn (de)
l'expression de texte a un commentateur (fr)
espressione di testo ha commentatore (it)
rdfs:range
rdfs:subClassOf
owl:Restriction
owl:onProperty
human:personHasRole
owl:someValuesFrom
text-expression:Commentator
human:Person

rdfs:comment

text-expression:hasExplicitLiteral
a
owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating an untitled text expression to the literal of an end part thereof as identifier of the text.
rdfs:domain
text-expression:Expression
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-expression:
rdfs:label
hat Explicitliteralz (de)
a littéral d'un explicite (fr)
ha letterale del esplicito (it)
has explicit literal (en)
rdfs:range
rdfs:Literal
rdfs:subPropertyOf
text-expression:hasIdentifierLiteral
text:hasTextLiteral

owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment

text-expression:Expression
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-expression:

hat ideeller Umfangbeschreibungliterale (de)
rdfs:range
